ModMetaData.name: Take My Organs (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Duck
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Ducks mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1707966478
- Rewrote it using patches instead to avoid overwriting vanilla defs
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/TakeMyOrgans][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] This Mod takes the debuff from My Organs harvested and Colonist organs harvested. My Organs harvested From -30 to 0 My Organs harvested From -30 to 20 required Trait Masochist Colonist organs harvested From -5 to 0
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
